response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and features, the product is valued at $12,000 by us. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I believe this is an opportunity for both of us to benefit. To make this deal attractive, I am offering you the chance to acquire it for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived value, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
